function.name: get_rss_feed_titles_and_urls
function.description: Fetches the RSS feed content from a predefined URL, extracts the titles and URLs of the items, and returns them as JSON.

function.name: extract_article_content
function.description: Fetches the content of an article from its URL and extracts the main content to interview the user

article_url.description: The URL of the article to extract content from.
